headline: I'm Eric Quinn, a full-stack dev in America.
subheadline: I'm a full-stack developer with a passion for creating beautiful, functional, and user-friendly websites and applications. I'm a self-taught developer with a background in graphic design and a love for learning new things. I'm always looking for new opportunities to grow and expand my skills.
